sentence.Network_en: Character is not separable from physical form but is governed by it.
sentence.Network_cn: 性格和外表是分不开的，而且观其形知其性。

sentence.Network_en: The moral question is not entirely separable from the financial one.
sentence.Network_cn: 道德问题和财政问题不能截然分开。

sentence.Network_en: The lower part of the pipe is separable from the upper part.
sentence.Network_cn: 管子的下部可与上部分开.

separable 可分的separable 可分离的Separate Bill of Lading 分提单
... ［10］中证明对一般射影代数簇都存在雅可比簇．文献［11］和［12］给出了阿贝尔簇的代数系统理论，其中有关可分(separable)、正则 (regular)和本原扩张(pri-maryextention)的论述，已成为这一领域的基.

-tion后缀 ... preparation 准备,预备 separation 分离,分开 celebration 庆祝(会),庆典.

有关环境污染的英语词汇 ... scrubbers 洗涤器 separators 分离器 smoke prevention 防烟.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin separabilis, from separare 'disjoin, divide' (see separate)

entry.tran: 可分开的;可分离的;可分隔的
entry.def: If things are separable, they can be separated from each other.

example.ex: Character is not separable from physical form but is governed by it.
example.tran: 性格和外表是分不开的，而且观其形知其性。

means.word_mean: 1. capable of being divided or dissociated;

sentences.sentence: "often drugs and crime are not dissociable"
"the siamese twins were not considered seperable"
"a song...never conceived of as severable from the melody";

auth_sentence.content: Space and time were not separable categories but aspects of one another.
auth_sentence.res_content: Space and time were not separable categories but aspects of one another.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Space and time were not separable categories but aspects of one another.

auth_sentence.content: Our work is showing that these are all separable in the brain.
auth_sentence.res_content: Our work is showing that these are all separable in the brain.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Our work is showing that these are all separable in the brain.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =bring birth,表示"生产,生出小孩"; 2. =come in sight,表示"看见;出现"; 3. =get ready,表示"准备;安置"; 4. =equal,表示"平等"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 一胎多子的, 经产的, 非初产的, [植]多产的
stems_affixes.word_buile: multi多+par生产,生出小孩+ous……的→多生产的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 初产的, 初次分娩的
stems_affixes.word_buile: primi=prim第一,最初+par生产,生出小孩+ous……的→adj.初产的, 初次分娩的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 表面上的,貌似真实的;显然的,明明白白的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ap一再+par看见;出现+ent……的→一再能看见→显而易见
trans横穿+par看见;出现+ent……的→横穿过去看得一样清楚→透明的
in不+separable[adj.可分离的, 可分的]→adj.不能分的
se分离+par置+able……的→adj.可分离的, 可分的
se分离+par置+ate表形容词→adj.分开的, 分离的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 无准备的, 即席的, 尚未准备好的
stems_affixes.word_buile: un无+prepare准备+ed……的→adj.无准备的, 即席的, 尚未准备好的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 可比较的, 比得上的
stems_affixes.word_buile: compare比较+able……的→adj.可比较的, 比得上的
compare比较+ative表形容词→adj.比较的, 相当的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 奇数的,不成对的,不平等
stems_affixes.word_buile: im不+parity[n.同等;奇偶]→adj.奇数的,不成对的,不平等
non不,无+par平等+eil→无平等的→无与伦比的
apparent显然的+ly表副词→adv.显然地
separate分开+ly表副词→adv.个别地;分离地
comparative[adj.比较的, 相当的]+ly表副词→adv.比较地, 相当地
par生产,生出小孩+ent……人→n.父母,母亲;[n.]双亲;父母

stems_affixes.value_cn: 透明, 透明度, 幻灯片, 有图案的玻璃
stems_affixes.word_buile: transparent[[adj.透明的]]→n.透明, 透明度, 幻灯片, 有图案的玻璃

stems_affixes.value_cn: 器械,器具,仪器;机构,组织
stems_affixes.word_buile: ap=ad+par准备;安置+atus表名词→准备好用的东西→设备
par准备;安置+ade表名词→本为部队训练场[即准备打仗得地方],引申为排队游行
prepare准备+ation行为,过程→n.准备, 预备
re再+pair=par准备;安置→重新准备好→修理
com一起+pari=par平等+son→一起平等→比较
dis不+parity同等→n.不同,差异
par平等→n.一对, 一双
par平等+ity表名词→n.同等;奇偶
par准备;安置+ade表名词→本为部队训练场[即准备打仗得地方],引申为排队游行
par准备;安置+ade表名词→本为部队训练场[即准备打仗得地方],引申为排队游行
pre预先+par准备;安置+e→预先准备好
re再+pair=par准备;安置→重新准备好→修理
com共同+par平等+e→平等的放在一起→比较
dis不+par平等+age动词后缀→不平等对待→轻视

Sentence.sentence: The error here is far too deep: not only do humans need nature for themselves, but the very idea that humanity and the natural world are separable things is profoundly damaging.
It is extremely harmful to think that humanity and the natural world can be separable things
